name: SailAway (flixabua, Zockchster)
description:
You are a pirate, aren't you? Use your sailing skills to gather all the loot to win. This game is about relaxation and exploration. Made for the course Interaktionsmethoden und Geräte by Jonas Hack, Felix Völk and Artjom Zakoyan.

Use a Controller for the best experience.
